con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V6" xmlns:tns="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V6" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdlsoap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V6" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <annotation> <appinfo> <version>6.0.0</version> </appinfo> </annotation> <complexType name="SoapHeader"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="license" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="apiAccountId" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="apiAccountPassword" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="accountId" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="onBehalfOfAccountId" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="onBehalfOfPassword" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SoapResponseHeader"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="service" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="remainingQuota" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="quotaUsedForThisRequest" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="timeTakenMillis" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="CampaignSelector"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="accountId" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="campaignIds" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="userStatuses" type="tns:UserStatus"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="biddingStrategyIds" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="paging" type="tns:Paging"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Paging"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="startIndex" type="xsd:int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="numberResults" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="UserStatus"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <enumeration value="PAUSED"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="Campaign"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="accountId" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="campaignId" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="campaignTrackId" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="campaignName" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="userStatus" type="tns:UserStatus"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="servingStatus" type="tns:CampaignServingStatus"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="startDate" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="endDate" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="budget" type="tns:Budget"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="biddingStrategyConfiguration" type="tns:BiddingStrategy"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="biddingStrategyFailedReason" type="tns:BiddingStrategyFailedReason"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="failedBiddingStrategyConfiguration" type="tns:BiddingStrategy"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="conversionOptimizerEligibility" type="tns:ConversionOptimizerEligibility"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="adServingOptimizationStatus" type="tns:AdServingOptimizationStatus"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="settings" type="tns:Settings"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="campaignType" type="tns:CampaignType"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="appStore" type="tns:AppStore"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="appId" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="trackingUrl" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="customParameters" type="tns:CustomParameters"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="urlReviewData" type="tns:UrlReviewData"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="CampaignServingStatus"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="SERVING"/> <enumeration value="ENDED"/> <enumeration value="PENDING"/> <enumeration value="STOP"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="Budget"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="period" type="tns:BudgetPeriod"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="amount" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="deliveryMethod" type="tns:BudgetDeliveryMethod"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="BudgetPeriod"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="DAILY"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="BudgetDeliveryMethod"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="STANDARD"/> <enumeration value="ACCELERATED"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="BiddingStrategyFailedReason"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="FAILURE"/> <enumeration value="CONVERSION_TRACKING_NOT_ENABLED"/> <enumeration value="NOT_ENOUGH_CONVERSIONS"/> <enumeration value="CANNOT_CREATE_CAMPAIGN_WITH_CONVERSION_OPTIMIZER"/> <enumeration value="BIDDING_STRATEGY_CANNOT_BE_OVERRIDDEN"/> <enumeration value="NOT_CPC_CAMPAIGN"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType abstract="true" name="Settings"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="type" type="tns:SettingType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="SettingType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="GEO_TARGET_TYPE_SETTING"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="GeoTargetTypeSetting"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:Settings"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="positiveGeoTargetType" type="tns:GeoTargetType"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="negativeGeoTargetType" type="tns:GeoTargetType"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <simpleType name="GeoTargetType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="DONT_CARE"/> <enumeration value="AREA_OF_INTENT"/> <enumeration value="LOCATION_OF_PRESENCE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="BiddingStrategy"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="biddingStrategyId" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="biddingStrategyName" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="biddingStrategyType" type="tns:BiddingStrategyType"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="biddingStrategySource" type="tns:BiddingStrategySource"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="biddingScheme" type="tns:BiddingScheme"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="BiddingStrategyType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="MANUAL_CPC"/> <enumeration value="BUDGET_OPTIMIZER"/> <enumeration value="PAGE_ONE_PROMOTED"/> <enumeration value="TARGET_ROAS"/> <enumeration value="TARGET_SPEND"/> <enumeration value="ENHANCED_CPC"/> <enumeration value="TARGET_CPA"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="BiddingStrategySource"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="CAMPAIGN"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType abstract="true" name="BiddingScheme"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="biddingStrategyType" type="tns:BiddingStrategyType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ManualCpcBiddingScheme"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:BiddingScheme"/> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="BudgetOptimizerBiddingScheme"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:BiddingScheme"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="bidCeiling" type="xsd:long"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="EnhancedCpcBiddingScheme"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:BiddingScheme"/> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="PageOnePromotedBiddingScheme"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:BiddingScheme"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="targetPositionType" type="tns:TargetPositionType"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="bidCeiling" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="bidMultiplier" type="xsd:double"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="bidChangesForRaisesOnly" type="tns:BidChangesForRaisesOnly"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="raiseBidWhenBudgetConstrained" type="tns:RaiseBidWhenBudgetConstrained"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="raiseBidWhenLowQualityScore" type="tns:RaiseBidWhenLowQualityScore"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <simpleType name="TargetPositionType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="PAGE_ONE"/> <enumeration value="PAGE_ONE_PROMOTED"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="BidChangesForRaisesOnly"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <enumeration value="DEACTIVE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="RaiseBidWhenBudgetConstrained"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <enumeration value="DEACTIVE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="RaiseBidWhenLowQualityScore"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <enumeration value="DEACTIVE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="TargetCpaBiddingScheme"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:BiddingScheme"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="targetCpa" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="bidCeiling" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="bidFloor" type="xsd:long"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="TargetSpendBiddingScheme"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:BiddingScheme"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="bidCeiling" type="xsd:long"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="TargetRoasBiddingScheme"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:BiddingScheme"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="targetRoas" type="xsd:double"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="bidCeiling" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="bidFloor" type="xsd:long"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <simpleType name="ConversionOptimizerEligibility"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="ENABLE"/> <enumeration value="DISABLE"/> <enumeration value="CAMPAIGN_IS_NOT_ACTIVE"/> <enumeration value="NOT_CPC_CAMPAIGN"/> <enumeration value="CONVERSION_TRACKING_NOT_ENABLED"/> <enumeration value="NOT_ENOUGH_CONVERSIONS"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="AdServingOptimizationStatus"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="OPTIMIZE"/> <enumeration value="ROTATE"/> <enumeration value="ROTATE_INDEFINITELY"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="CampaignType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="STANDARD"/> <enumeration value="MOBILE_APP"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="AppStore"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="IOS"/> <enumeration value="ANDROID"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="CustomParameters"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="isRemove" type="tns:IsRemove"/> <element maxOccurs="3" minOccurs="0" name="parameters" type="tns:CustomParameter"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="CustomParameter"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="key" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="UrlReviewData"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="inReviewUrl" type="tns:ReviewUrl"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="disapprovalReviewUrl" type="tns:ReviewUrl"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="urlApprovalStatus" type="tns:UrlApprovalStatus"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="disapprovalReasonCodes" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ReviewUrl"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="trackingUrl" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="3" minOccurs="0" name="parameters" type="tns:CustomParameter"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="IsRemove"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="FALSE"/> <enumeration value="TRUE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="UrlApprovalStatus"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="NONE"/> <enumeration value="APPROVED"/> <enumeration value="APPROVED_WITH_REVIEW"/> <enumeration value="REVIEW"/> <enumeration value="DISAPPROVED"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="CampaignPage"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:Page"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="values" type="tns:CampaignValues"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="CampaignValues"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:ReturnValue"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="campaign" type="tns:Campaign"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType abstract="true" name="ReturnValue"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="operationSucceeded" type="xsd:boolean"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="tns:Error"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Error"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="code" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="detail" type="tns:ErrorDetail"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ErrorDetail"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="requestKey" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="requestValue" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType abstract="true" name="Page"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="totalNumEntries" type="xsd:int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Page.Type" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="CampaignOperation"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:Operation"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="accountId" type="xsd:long"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="operand" type="tns:Campaign"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType abstract="true" name="Operation"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="operator" type="tns:Operator"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="Operator"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="ADD"/> <enumeration value="SET"/> <enumeration value="REMOVE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="CampaignReturnValue"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:ListReturnValue"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="values" type="tns:CampaignValues"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType abstract="true" name="ListReturnValue"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ListReturnValue.Type" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Operation.Type" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="get"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="selector" type="tns:CampaignSelector"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="rval" type="tns:CampaignPage"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="tns:Error"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="mutate"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="operations" type="tns:CampaignOperation"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="mutateResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="rval" type="tns:CampaignReturnValue"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="tns:Error"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="RequestHeader" type="tns:SoapHeader"/> <element name="ResponseHeader" type="tns:SoapResponseHeader"/> <element name="ApiExceptionFault" type="xsd:string"/> </schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="RequestHeader"> <wsdl:part element="tns:RequestHeader" name="RequestHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResponseHeader"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ResponseHeader" name="ResponseHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:get" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="mutateRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:mutate" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="mutateResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:mutateResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ApiException"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ApiExceptionFault" name="ApiException"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CampaignServiceInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="get"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getRequest" name="getRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getResponse" name="getResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ApiException" name="ApiException"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="mutate"> <wsdl:input message="tns:mutateRequest" name="mutateRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:mutateResponse" name="mutateResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ApiException" name="ApiException"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CampaignServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:CampaignServiceInterface"> <wsdlsoap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="get"> <wsdlsoap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="getRequest"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns:RequestHeader" part="RequestHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getResponse"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns:ResponseHeader" part="ResponseHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ApiException"> <wsdlsoap:fault name="ApiException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="mutate"> <wsdlsoap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="mutateRequest"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns:RequestHeader" part="RequestHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="mutateResponse"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns:ResponseHeader" part="ResponseHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ApiException"> <wsdlsoap:fault name="ApiException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CampaignService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:CampaignServiceSoapBinding" name="CampaignService"> <wsdlsoap:address location="https://USE_ADDRESS_RETURNED_BY_LOCATION_SERVICE/services/V6.0/CampaignService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 01
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cam="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901/Campaign" xmlns:v20="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201901"> <soapenv:Header> <cam:RequestHeader> <v20:license>2755-9110-4041-8440</v20:license> <v20:apiAccountId>9452-9704-5517-3069</v20:apiAccountId> <v20:apiAccountPassword>Yj1Aml2017</v20:apiAccountPassword> <!--Optional:--> <v20:accountId>932423</v20:accountId> <!--Optional:--> <v20:onBehalfOfAccountId>fW4TT-xm01-6w5eP-V4TY</v20:onBehalfOfAccountId> <!--Optional:--> <v20:onBehalfOfPassword>IEwNPvUeygAbKxvQQMTUHxpSKBMPJkeQ</v20:onBehalfOfPassword> </cam:RequestHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <cam:get> <cam:selector> <cam:accountId>932423</cam:accountId> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <cam:userStatuses>ACTIVE</cam:userStatuses> <cam:userStatuses>PAUSED</cam:userStatuses> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--<cam:biddingStrategyIds></cam:biddingStrategyIds:--> <!--Optional:--> <cam:paging> <v20:startIndex>1</v20:startIndex> <v20:numberResults>100</v20:numberResults> </cam:paging> </cam:selector> </cam:get> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.name: Request-new
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cam="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201805/Campaign" xmlns:v20="http://ss.yahooapis.jp/V201805"> <soapenv:Header> <cam:RequestHeader> <v20:license>2755-9110-4041-8440</v20:license> <v20:apiAccountId>9452-9704-5517-3069</v20:apiAccountId> <v20:apiAccountPassword>Yj1Aml2017</v20:apiAccountPassword> <!--Optional:--> <v20:accountId>1127283</v20:accountId> <!--Optional:--> <v20:onBehalfOfAccountId>SiGko-FKrc-TBbzT-Fmar</v20:onBehalfOfAccountId> <!--Optional:--> <v20:onBehalfOfPassword>ZLNbReIUxOJGNBThxXbTMafaMynxwvYP</v20:onBehalfOfPassword> </cam:RequestHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <cam:get> <cam:selector> <cam:accountId>1127283</cam:accountId> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <cam:userStatuses>ACTIVE</cam:userStatuses> <cam:userStatuses>PAUSED</cam:userStatuses> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <cam:biddingStrategyIds></cam:biddingStrategyIds> <!--Optional:--> <cam:paging> <v20:startIndex>1</v20:startIndex> <v20:numberResults>100</v20:numberResults> </cam:paging> </cam:selector> </cam:get> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
